objects.description: [HIUPAN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1230) has periodically checked for removable and hot-plugged drives connected to the infected machine, should one be found [HIUPAN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1230) will propagate to the removeable drives by copying itself and accompanying malware components to a directory to the new drive in a hidden subdirectory `<Drive_Letter>:\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\` and hides any other existing files to ensure UsbConfig.exe is the only visible file on the device.(Citation: 2025_IBM_PUBLOAD_TONESHELL_HIUPAN_CLAIMLOADER_MUSTANG PANDA)(Citation: Trend Micro MUSTANG PANDA PUBLOAD HIUPAN SEPTEMBER 2024)
